name: WOOF & FiSh
description:
Alright so imagine this...

A dog - and his name is Woof, now - hear me out - he looks like a shiny square, in fact, everything looks shiny and plastic.

He's going through the dungeon, right? And he finds this magic fish that teleports between levels and shoots lazers, okay? Now, he "joins together" with this fish to complete the dungeon, easy, right?

Good luck completing the last level :).
